AboutMe.title: Hey there, I'm Maksym
AboutMe.p1: a front-end developer based in Odessa, Ukraine. With two years of commercial experience.
AboutMe.p2: I specialize in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Next.js. My skills lie in crafting the front-end part of web applications. I am adept at creating modern, performant web applications that seamlessly integrate cutting-edge features.
AboutMe.p3: If you're looking for a front-end developer to bring your project to life, I'm here to help. Let's collaborate and create something amazing together.
